citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Significant changes were enacted in a protocol without IACUC review and approval and/or appropriate handling and
documentation of administrative changes. On 10/15/24, a procedure was being conducted under anesthesia on dog ID
D2404. The protocol (5043) requires an intravenous catheter to be placed to administer anesthetic drugs and fluids. The
Anesthesia Log for dog D2404 documents that no intravenous catheter was placed and no fluids or IV anesthetics were
administered.
Making significant changes to protocols without IACUC review and approval deprives the IACUC of the opportunity to
provide oversight of animal activities and compliance with the Animal Welfare Act.
The IACUC must review and approve significant changes regarding the care and use of animals in ongoing activities.
Correct by: Corrective actions were taken by the facility prior to inspection. Continue to ensure the IACUC reviews and
approves significant changes in protocols from 6/23/25 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC representatives.
